trait.name: Connaissance des armes à feu
entries: The giff's mastery of his weapons allows him to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

trait.name: La constance dans l'action
entries: On the deck of a ship, the giff has the advantage on ability tests and saving throws made against effects that would knock him over {@condition prone} or push him overboard.

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: The giff makes two attacks with a longsword or musket.

action.name: Épée longue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit a target at a range of 1.5 m. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) cutting damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) cutting damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Mousquetaire
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 40/36 m., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Grenade de force
entries: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet, and the grenade explodes in a sphere 20 feet in radius. Each creature in this area must make a saving throw of {@dc 15} Dexterity, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Strength damage on failure, or half the damage on success. After the giff has thrown the grenade, roll a {@dice d6}; on a result of 4 or less, the giff has no more grenades to throw.
